title: Where did the name "Minigue" come from?
text: Well, once in the testing phase he just talked of himself as "Minigeue", so we called him "Minigue" for easier spelling. ğŸ˜

title: What are you doing with my chat inputs?
text: Except for generating a response from MiniguePT - nothing. We have no idea what you are messaging the bot and we don't care either. ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

title: What happens when I like/dislike a certain message?
text: The last few messages you exchanged with Minigue will be sent to our laboratories to improve the bot in the future! ğŸ¥¼

title: How can I fix my Minigue if its replies are nonsensical?

title: Why did my Minigue start rambling german things?
text: Like the creator, Minigues seems to be somewhat bilingual. If you keep using English, itâ€™ll switch back quickly. ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§

title: Why is Minigues German bad, nothing he says makes sense?
text: Minigue is still new to German and chatting in English will make it easier for both of you. ğŸ™ƒ

title: Where can I find the source code?
text: The source code is available on GitHub. You can just click the Github button at the top right. ğŸ¤“

title: What about bugs I found and my great ideas?
text: Feel free to share everything that comes to your mind! Weâ€™d be very happy to hear about any suggestions. Feel free to create an issue directly in the repo or send us a message. ğŸ’Œ
